step_description: Check if this is a simple page that only needs to show contact information:
description: Pages that only need a contact email displayed

good_examples: "Build me a business card" → just needs "Contact: email@domain.com"
"Create an about page for my consulting firm" → just needs contact email displayed
"Make a landing page for my photography business" → just needs "Hire me: email@domain.com"
"Build a coming soon page" → just needs "Questions? email@domain.com"
"Create a personal portfolio" → just needs contact email shown
"Make a small business website" → just needs business contact email
"Build a freelancer page" → just needs "Contact me: email@domain.com"
"Create a team member profile" → just needs individual contact email

metadata_output.EMAIL_CONTEXT: Display contact information for business/personal contact
